page.title: 12EDUCATION IN THE AREA
page.content: In Comberton there are four schools, there is a college, a primary, a private and a nursery. We went and asked local people their views on education and schools. Meridian School has an excellent reputation though Meridian should have smaller classes because we have 31 and more in a class. The subjects that they teach at Meridian are good.The college has a good reputation but more disipline is needed.The exams you can pass at the college are CSE (certificate of secondary education.) GCE (genaral certificate of education.) 'O' levels (ordinary exam) 'A' levels (advanced exam.) The parents of the children at any of the four schools when asked, said they were satisfied with the education supplied.
